text: Santosh Yadav (born 1955) is an Indian politician. She is the incumbent deputy speaker of the Haryana Legislative Assembly. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1955 births Category:Women in Haryana politics Category:Deputy Speakers of the Haryana Legislative Assembly Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Haryana Category:People from Mahendragarh district Category:Haryana MLAs 2014–2019
title: Santosh Yadav (politician)
